description: Swap tokens on the NEO blockchain with slippage and deadline controls. View balances and account details for your wallet. Use your own wallet and RPC endpoint for secure, direct execution.

capabilities.name: swap
capabilities.description: Execute a token swap on the NEO blockchain using the specified DEX contract

capabilities.name: addLiquidity
capabilities.description: Add liquidity to a token pair on the NEO blockchain DEX

capabilities.name: stake
capabilities.description: Stake liquidity pool token (bNEO-TTM-1940) to the staking contract

capabilities.name: getPair
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a token pair from the DEX

capabilities.name: getTokens
capabilities.description: Get a list of all available tokens on the DEX

capabilities.name: getAllTokenPrices
capabilities.description: Get current prices for all tokens on the DEX

capabilities.name: getTokenPrice
capabilities.description: Get the current price for a specific token

capabilities.name: getTokenPriceHistory
capabilities.description: Get historical price data for a specific token

capabilities.name: getAllPairs
capabilities.description: Get a list of all available trading pairs on the DEX

capabilities.name: get-account-info
capabilities.description: Get information about the configured NEO account
